pr_title: Extract distribution archive checks into plugin

timeline.message:
Extract distribution archive checks into plugin

- Added test coverage
- Removes build script cluttering
- Splits archive building and archive checking logic
Fix tar handling in tests on linux
Remove log4c from expected ml licenses

Allow configuring expected ML licenses

- only rely on boost for now (tbd)

timeline.bodyText: This is actually a change in behaviour from master as discussed here: https://elastic.slack.com/archives/C8UUBNASY/p1598283630030100
timeline.author: breskeby

timeline.bodyText: Can we not use a TaskProvider here?
timeline.author: mark-vieira

timeline.bodyText: How much effort would it be to rework these implementations to not depend on the CLI tools and instead use Gradle provided archive operation APIs? As it if essentially if our logic to find tar or zip on the classpath breaks, we'd just start silently skipping these checks.
timeline.author: mark-vieira

replies.bodyText: wasn't too much effort and made the plugin way simpler. 👍
replies.author: breskeby

timeline.message: Use Gradle build-in untar and unzip support
